law.catch_line: Land Of Insufficient Value To Meet Charges; Abatement
law.text: Whenever the commissioner deems any lands to have been assessed at a valuation insufficient to meet the charges and expenses of collecting the tax thereon, he may in writing authorize the assessors to abate the tax of their own motion as a tax which ought not to have been assessed. The authorization shall form a part of the assessorsâ€™ records of abatements.
